generated_body: The article titled "Unexpected Signs of an Unhealthy Heart" is likely to discuss various indicators that may suggest poor cardiovascular health, which are not commonly recognized. The piece may also include some preventive measures or lifestyle changes that can contribute to better heart health. Additionally, it could highlight the importance of regular check-ups in identifying these unexpected signs early on, although the specifics of these signs are not detailed in the title alone.
